title: Understanding Text Rotation
text: To rotate text in a cell, you need to access the alignment settings. This is where you can adjust the orientation of the text.

hintAnswer: click the alignment settings dialog box, then choose a point to rotate to
title: Accessing Alignment Settings
text: To rotate text, first, you need to open the alignment settings dialog box. Do you know how to access it?
choices: click the alignment settings dialog box, then choose a point to rotate to
type in a number to indicate the degree

title: Choosing the Rotation Angle
text: Once you have accessed the alignment settings, you can choose the angle to which you want to rotate the text. This can be done by selecting a point on the rotation dial.
